title: Tokyo faces state of emergency ahead of the Olympics due to Covid fears, likely banning fans
content:
1. Tokyo faces state of emergency ahead of the Olympics due to Covid fears, likely banning fans  CNBC Television
  2. Spectators barred from Tokyo Olympics venues amid Japan's COVID-19 state of emergency  ESPN
  3. Spectators Will Be Barred at Tokyo Olympics Amid New Covid Emergency  The New York Times
  4. Olympic leaders are making sure the Tokyo Games are safe — from liability  The Washington Post
  5. Japanese public worried Olympics may be a super-spreader event despite spectator ban  PBS NewsHour
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
